works.description: Real estate records are made and broken every now and then, and we have seen so many estates selling for millions. But, when a property was sold lately for $6 million, it really caused a stir, the fact being that the said price was paid for Planet Calypso, a fictional place on a social gaming site. People have been spending real money to buy things in the virtual world, and see it as a sound investment. The virtual real estate is getting pricey with the time, and the records are surely going to drive you insane. Let’s take a look at some of the most expensive real estates from the virtual world.
